dc_title_s: Map of the Red River District, Manitoba: and adjacent country
dc_description_s: Scale approximately 1:3,100,000 (W 106°--W 88°/N 64°--N 46°). Relief shown by hachures. Shows railroads, roads, water carriage, and portages from Fort Carlson to Thunder Bay. Includes inset ancillary map showing proposed trans-Canadian railroad. 1 map : color, dissected and mounted on cloth ; 30 x 48 cm, folded and bound in portfolio 17 x 11 cm.
